title: Judeideh
description: Judeideh (also Jedīdē, Judaide) is a site in the middle Euphrates region in what was part of the ancient kingdom of Suhu. The city was situated on the east bank of the Euphrates, about ten kilometers downstream of Anat (Anatho). Like many towns and cities of the ancient kingdom of Suhu, Judeideh is now underwater; the area was flooded after the construction of the Haditha dam. Its ancient name is not known.

properties.description: Estimated, representative coordinates based on location of Sur Jureh shown in Map 2 of Iraq 45 (1981-82) and on Corona satellite imagery (1102-1025Fore [Dec 11, 1967]).
properties.title: Imagery Location of Judeideh
